forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 20 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the dawn arrives casting a gentle light over the cityscape, hinting at the beauty of the day ahead. The prediction of mostly sunny skies comes to fruition, though the air carries a refreshing bite from the southwest wind, rustling the leaves and stirring the faintest whispers of fog at the periphery. A hint of haze envelops the Golden Gate, teasing the edges with a marine layer that continues to flirt with the hills, yet visibility remains clear enough to appreciate the architectural artistry of the city.

As the day progresses, temperatures will ease downward into the afternoon, wrapping around the mid-60s—a comfortable embrace for those venturing outside. With a west-southwest wind whispering through the avenues at a brisk pace, it’s wise to don layers: a light sweater or jacket will ward against the coolness while allowing the sun to warm the skin. This climate beckons opportunities for the mundane yet delightful—perhaps a leisurely stroll through the Embarcadero or a quiet reading session at a nearby café, where the hum of conversation blends with the gentle clinking of coffee cups. Each moment invites you to savor the colors and sounds of the city stirred into life beneath a predominantly blue sky.
